did.abstract: The records consist of reports and analyses documenting the activities and operations of the Gift Accounting Office, including records for the Campaign for Yale. Also included are printouts of gifts by source, category, and purpose; printouts on pledge information; and a gifts master list.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 7-B (YRG 7-B), Records of offices with specific development responsibilities at Yale University.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is restricted. See inventory for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Gift Accounting Office, Yale University, Records (RU 799). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Yale University records are arranged and described at the accession level by the creating office. The University Archives creates collection level descriptive records, but typically does no further arrangement and description at the accession level.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of reports and analyses documenting the activities and operations of the Gift Accounting Office, including records for the Campaign for Yale. Also included are printouts of gifts by source, category, and purpose; printouts on pledge information; and a gifts master list.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.
